document_data.name: Northern Means
document_data.mainbody: The '''Northern Means''' was a windswept trail that connected the city of [[Luskan]] to the [[Frozenfar]].
document_data.Geography: The trail started in [[Luskan]] and headed north until it met the [[Ten Trail]] south of the [[Spine of the World]]. It was snowy and windy with very few trees or hills along it to provide shelter. Moreover, the trail practically disappeared during the winter due to heavy snowfall.
document_data.Trade: Trade caravans traveling along the Northern Means were frequently attacked by the [[Black Raven Tribe]].
